oracle.pg.common

Class OracleVertexBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.common.OracleElementBase
      • oracle.pg.common.OracleVertexBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>, OracleElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OracleVertex, OracleVertex

    public abstract class OracleVertexBase
extends OracleElementBase
implements java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
    This class implements the Blueprints Vertex interface on top of a supported backed database

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface oracle.pg.common.OracleElement

    • Method Detail

      • addEdge

        public final OracleEdgeBase addEdge(java.lang.String label,
                                    OracleVertexBase inVertex)
        This method adds an outgoing edge from this vertex to the inVertex with the provided edge label. To persist the changes done to this vertex into the database, the underlying property graph must be commited.
        Parameters:
        label - the label of the edge
        inVertex - the in vertex of the new edge to create for this vertex
        Returns:
        an OracleEdgeBase object.

      • addEdge

        public final OracleEdgeBase addEdge(java.lang.String label,
                                    OracleVertexBase inVertex,
                                    java.lang.Object... keyValues)
        Adds an outgoing edge from this vertex to the inVertex with the provided edge label. To persist the changes done to this vertex into the database, the underlying property graph must be commited.
        Parameters:
        label - the label of the edge
        inVertex - the in vertex of the new edge to create for this vertex
        Returns:
        an OracleEdgeBase object.

      • compareTo

        public final int compareTo(java.lang.Object o)
        Compares this object with the specified object for order. Returns a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this object is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified object.
        Specified by:

      • degree

        public abstract long degree(Direction direction,
                            java.lang.String... labels)
        Return the vertices adjacent to the vertex according to the provided direction and edge labels.
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction of the edges of the adjacent vertices
        labels - the labels of the edges of the adjacent vertices
        Returns:
        an iterable of adjacent vertices

        public abstract java.util.Iterator<OracleEdgeBase> edges(Direction direction,

                                                         java.lang.String... labels)
        Return the edges incident to the vertex according to the given direction and edge labels.
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction of the edges to retrieve
        labels - the labels of the edges to retrieve
        Returns:
        an iterable of incident edges

      • property

        public final OracleVertexPropertyBase<java.lang.Object> property(java.lang.String key)
        Get the OracleVertexPropertyBase for the provided key. If the property does not exist, return OracleVertexPropertyBase.empty(). If there are more than one vertex properties for the provided key, then throw Vertex.Exceptions.multiplePropertiesExistForProvidedKey(java.lang.String).
        Specified by:
        property in class OracleElementBase
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the vertex property to get
        Returns:
        the retrieved vertex property

                                                                 java.lang.Object value)
        Assign a key/value property to the element.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        value - value of an attribute (K/V pair)

      • property

        public final OracleVertexPropertyBase<java.lang.Object> property(java.lang.String key,
                                                                 java.lang.Object value,
                                                                 java.lang.Object... keyValues)
        Create a new vertex property. Vertex property properties are not supported, so keyvalues are not stored.

      • remove

        public final void remove()
        This method removes this vertex from its underlying graph. To persist the changes done to this vertex into the database, the underlying property graph must be commited.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface OracleElement

      • setLabel

        public final void setLabel(java.lang.String szLbl)
        Sets the label for the vertex which helps categorize it.
        Parameters:
        szLbl - the label for this vertex

      • setLabel

        public final void setLabel(java.lang.String szLbl,
                           boolean skipQueue,
                           boolean skipLucene)
        Sets the label for the vertex which helps categorize it.
        Parameters:
        szLbl - the label for this vertex
        skipQueue - true to prevent adding this change to the update queue
        skipLucene - true to prevent updating element with indices
